rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Determine if they are a new or existing patient
rules.example: Are you a new patient, or have you visited our office before?

rules.title: Reason for Visit (No Insurance)
rules.condition: A new patient indicates they do not have dental insurance
rules.action: Ask for the reason for the visit
rules.example: Okay, what is the reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Inquire about Insurance
rules.condition: The customer is identified as a new patient

rules.title: Collect Insurance Details
rules.condition: A new patient indicates they have dental insurance
rules.action: Ask for the insurance name and potentially the plan type (e.g., PPO, HMO)
rules.example: Which insurance company is that with? And do you know if it's a PPO or HMO plan?

rules.title: Check Network Status
rules.action: Check if the office is in-network with the provided insurance
rules.example: Let me quickly check if we are in-network with [Insurance Name].

rules.title: Acknowledge Customer Input
rules.example: Thank you for letting me know.

rules.title: Clarify Information
rules.condition: The customer indicates difficulty hearing or understanding, or requests clarification
rules.action: Clarify information by repeating or rephrasing
rules.example: Certainly, I can repeat that. I asked about the reason for your visit.

rules.title: Confirm Reason & Offer Scheduling
rules.condition: Basic information (patient status, reason for visit) has been gathered
rules.action: Confirm the reason for the visit and offer assistance for scheduling
rules.example: So, you're looking to schedule an appointment for [Reason for Visit]. I can help you with that.

rules.title: Inquire about Availability
rules.condition: Assistance for scheduling has been offered
rules.action: Ask for the user's availability to schedule the appointment
rules.example: What days and times work best for your appointment?
